title: LOL! Someone is using my font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152658im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/screenshot_0252_4151.png)

Gaia Online is doing one of their events and I see their doctors notes are written in Gemelli.  
I released that font as free years ago, so there is nothing I can do to claim anything for it now. Still, it’s nice to see it getting some use out there in the world.

 [‹ type size for a magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152658/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41586 "Go to previous forum topic") [Quite an old sans serif - what do you think? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821152658/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41906 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cuttlefish

comments.content: Bad choice for a doctor’s note - you can read it!
The bigger question is why were you on Gaia in the first place?!
